replies: You want to implement your green new deal that would bankrupt the country, tax everyone into poverty, and put all the money and power into the hands of the corrupt left elitists. Maybe you aren't the best on prioritizing the economic well being of anyone.

You know what's also costly? The billions spent in rebuilding after a series category 5 hurricane which are occuring more often due to climate change.

'Til countries like China and India decide 2 clean up their act, not much would change anyway. The US has just about the lowest emissions of any industrialized country. Besides, AOC claims the world ends in 12 years without this deal. It would take 25 to do it. Screwed either way
